DOC.brief_summary: This study examine efficacy `` Preconception Reproductive Knowledge Promotion ( PREKNOP ) '' intervention , design promote woman 's reproductive health positive pregnancy outcome . The study 's goal educate low-income woman reproductive change relate menstrual cycle . The main hypothesis study woman receive PREKNOP intervention report reduce risk unplanned pregnancy increase reproductive knowledge , self-efficacy knowledge , pregnancy planning ability .
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , control trial PREKNOP intervention sample 120 woman 18-44 year old . Teams nursing student community health worker administer 12-month intervention . In addition 10 home visit woman receive information female reproductive system expect monthly cyclical change , PREKNOP consist use ovulation test kit , 12-month menstrual calendar , digital thermometer , educational brochure cover : female reproductive anatomy , hormone menstrual cycle , recognize ovulation period , various method birth control work , early pregnancy symptom .
DOC.criteria: lowincome woman childbearing age Menopause Hysterectomy
